metadata.title: CVE-2021-47459 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: can:j1939: j1939_netdev_start(): fix UAF for rx_kref of j1939_priv It willtrigger UAF for rx_kref of j1939_priv as following. cpu0 cpu1j1939_sk_bind(socket0, ndev0, ...) j1939_netdev_startj1939_sk_bind(socket1, ndev0, ...) j1939_netdev_start j1939_priv_setj1939_priv_get_by_ndev_locked j1939_jsk_add ..... j1939_netdev_stopkref_put_lock(&priv->rx_kref, ...) kref_get(&priv->rx_kref, ...)REFCOUNT_WARN("addition on 0;...")==================================================== refcount_t: additionon 0; use-after-free. WARNING: CPU: 1 PID: 20874 at lib/refcount.c:25refcount_warn_saturate+0x169/0x1e0 RIP:0010:refcount_warn_saturate+0x169/0x1e0 Call Trace:j1939_netdev_start+0x68b/0x920 j1939_sk_bind+0x426/0xeb0 ?security_socket_bind+0x83/0xb0 The rx_kref's kref_get() and kref_put()should use j1939_netdev_lock to protect.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-47459` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic-64k - 6.5.0-9.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-aws - 6.5.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-azure - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-gcp - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-gke - 6.8.0-1003.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1009-ibm - 6.5.0-1009.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency - 6.5.0-9.9.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-9.9.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1010-oracle - 6.5.0-1010.10
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1005-raspi - 6.5.0-1005.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-oem - 6.8.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1005-intel - 6.8.0-1001.6
No subscription required

linux-image-6.7.0-2001-raspi-realtime - 6.7.0-2001.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1008-realtime - 6.8.0-1008.19
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
